name: Chives (Fresh)
properties: Member of allium family (related to onions and garlic)
Rich in vitamins A, C, and K
benefits: Fresh chives are a delicate herb from the allium family, providing mild onion flavor without overpowering dishes. Mentioned as an optional garnish for soups. Contains beneficial organosulfur compounds like other alliums. Rich in vitamin K for bone health. Adds color and flavor to finished dishes.
amount: 1-2 tablespoons snipped fresh, used as garnish

quotes: Optional garnishes: snipped fresh chives, chopped fresh parsley, or coarsely ground nigella seeds
